title: Farcry 4 Mod: Remove Mouse Acceleration & No Intro Fix (far
description:
SEE THE README.TXT FOR INFORMATION



Someone requested just removing Mouse Accleration and no other edits to the original game. So here it is.

If you want a complete mod with gameplay changes and new features you can download the full versions of my Far Cry 3 and Far Cry 4 mods from


-----------------
INCLUDED FEATURES
-----------------

* Removed mouse acceleration (credit to Redditor Cr1N for discovering this!)

* Replaced the startup movies with blank .bik files.

------------
INSTALLATION
------------

This mod is installed like most Far Cry mods so if you have any experience with that this should be old hat to you. However if you are new to mods just remember this one golden rule: BACK UP your SAVE GAMES and your PATCH_HD.DAT & PATCH_HD.FAT files. More instructions below.

TL:DR - You should probably backup your saves (though I doubt it will do anything to them). Backup your patch_hd.dat & patch_hd.fat files. Replace patch_hd.dat and patch_hd.fat with this mods versions. 

STEP 1
Make back up copies (copy and paste) of your save games and the following two files:
patch_hd.dat
patch_hd.fat

Your save games should be located around:
C:Program Files (x86)UbisoftUbisoft Game Launchersavegames[long randomnumber]420 
(420 might be 856 or another number depending on the version of FC4 you have - i.e. deluxe, standard, gold, etc.)

patch_hd.dat & patch_hd.fat are located wherever your main Far Cry 4 directory is located:
[install path]Far Cry 4data_win32


STEP 2
Once you have backed those files up you simply copy the patch_hd.dat & patch_hd.fat files from this mod into your data_win32 folder (overwrite the old ones if asked - be sure they are backed up!)
